charges.charge_description: 21:841 - POSSESSION W/INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE IN EXCESS OF 100 KILOGRAMS MARIJUANA(1)
21:841(a)(1) - POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE 100 KILOGRAMS OR MORE OF MARIJUANA; 18:2 AIDING AND ABETTING.(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT 48 MONTHS, SUPERVISED RELEASE 4 YEARS, SPECIAL ASSESSMENT $100.00
